title: Bronto Software Named Finalist in 2015 Golden Bridge Awards
text:
Bronto Software Named Finalist in 2015 Golden Bridge Awards [October 19, 2015] Tweet 
DURHAM, N.C. , Oct. 19, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Bronto Software, the leader in commerce marketing automation and a NetSuite (NYSE: N) company, has been named a finalist in two categories for the 2015 Golden Bridge Awards - Company Growth of the Year and Best Support Department of the Year. 
Bronto's recognition as a Company Growth of the Year finalist is based on its outstanding revenue growth in 2014, the launch of several new products including the new Cart Recovery and Socialite apps, and its new offices in New York and Los Angeles that have led to an expanded customer base. Additionally, the company doubled the size of its Durham headquarters to accommodate a world-class engineering and technology center. Over the last 12 years, Bronto has grown from two employees to more than 280 and plans to increase that number to 300 by the end of 2015. 
Bronto's recognition for the Best Support Department of the Year stems from its global expansion of customer support in 2014, which included extended hours and dedicated specialists in its London and Sydney offices. In addition, Bronto consistently receives an average survey score of 95% by its customers and a Net Promoter Score (NPS) of 77 while the average NPS for technology companies is 37 and the average for online services is 36. 
"I would like to congratulate the entire Bronto team for this recogniton," said Bronto CEO Joe Colopy . "We've worked hard to expand and scale our solutions to fulfill the commerce marketing needs of industry-leading brands and set significant goals for growth. I'm excited about our continued success." 
The annual Golden Bridge Awards program, with active participation from a broad spectrum of industry voices, encompasses the world's best in organizational performance, products and services, partner programs and customer satisfaction programs. It also recognizes top executives and management teams, women in business and the innovation they bring to their professions. From a tactical perspective, the program acknowledges the creativity and execution of public relations and marketing campaigns that include case studies, websites, blogs, white-papers, videos and advertisements from every major industry in the world. 
Winners will be honored in San Francisco on Monday, November 16, 2015 during the annual awards dinner and presentations. 
To learn more about the Bronto Marketing Platform, visit bronto.com . 
About Bronto Software Bronto Software, a NetSuite (NYSE: N) company, provides a cloud-based commerce marketing automation platform to mid-market and enterprise organizations worldwide. Bronto is the number one ranked email marketing provider to the Internet Retailer Top 1000, with a client roster of leading brands, including Armani Exchange, Timex, Samsonite, Theory, Vince Camuto and Christopher & Banks. The Bronto Marketing Platform is deeply integrated with commerce platforms, such as NetSuite, Magento, Demandware and MarketLive. The company is headquartered in Durham, NC , with additional offices in London , Sydney , New York and Los Angeles . For more information, visit bronto.com . 
About the Golden Bridge Awards Golden Bridge Awards are an annual industry and peers recognition program honoring Best Companies of all types and sizes and the people behind them in North America , Europe , Middle-East , Africa , Asia-Pacific , and Latin-America , Best Products and Services, Innovations, Management and Professionals, Women in Business and the Professions, International Business, Corporate Communications, PR and Marketing, Product Management, Customer Service, Support, Human Resources, Information Technology, and Company Milestones. Learn more about the outstanding performances in the workplace recognized by Golden Bridge Awards worldwide at www.goldenbridgeawards.com .
